pageContext.claim: ““The FBI looked at less than 1%” of Crooked’s Emails!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is referring to a report from Real Clear Investigations that has not been independently confirmed by any other major news outlet. Former FBI Director James B. Comey testified that of the emails found on Weiner's laptop, "we've only had to personally read 6,000," because a computer scan could eliminate those that had already been reviewed.
